visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data for a year. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and it includes a background color and custom margins for better visual appeal. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis represents months, while the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additionally, the legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
